inputs.description: zip file that contains all the data necessary to run WiMMed on Sierra Nevada from Sep 2007 to Aug 2008, named 'data2007-2008.zip'
inputs.name: Data Water Year 2007-2008

outputs.description: Results from WiMMed. Final maps of meteorological and hydrological variables
outputs.name: Hydrometeorological maps. Simulation from 2007-09-01 to 2008-08-31
